item.title: Processing each powershell array value
item.description: Using the example in variable assignment And you want to do something to each variable, you may do the following: 1foreach ($i in $container_ids) { 2$i 3} So for instance, you want to delete all the containers: 1foreach ($i in $container_ids) { 2docker rm $i 3}

item.title: Assign Command Output to Powershell Array
